title: Difficulty activating new SIM card - Resolved

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: I have a problem with my account again.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I’m here to help, Ms. Thompson. Can you describe the difficulty activating new sim card?

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: It’s really frustrating, I thought this was fixed.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I’m sorry about the inconvenience. Let me check your account.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Why does this keep happening?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I’ll do my best to resolve it right away.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Okay, but this needs to be handled properly this time.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Understood. Let’s go step by step.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Fine, what do you need me to do?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Let’s start by verifying your information.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Alright, go ahead.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Thank you. I see the difficulty activating new sim card here now.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: So can you fix it?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I’m working on it now, please bear with me.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: How long will it take?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: We should resolve this within a few minutes.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Good. Because I can’t keep calling every week.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I understand completely, Ms. Thompson.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Okay. What’s the next step?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Let me escalate this to the right department if needed.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Why wasn’t it escalated earlier?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I apologize for the delay. I’ll escalate it now.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Fine. What happens after that?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: They’ll review and update me shortly.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: Alright. I’m waiting.
